install all the library in requirements.txt by enter: 
pip install -r requirements.txt

download the dataset at https://storage.googleapis.com/kaggle-data-sets/1554380/3952946/bundle/archive.zip?X-Goog-Algorithm=GOOG4-RSA-SHA256&X-Goog-Credential=gcp-kaggle-com%40kaggle-161607.iam.gserviceaccount.com%2F20240719%2Fauto%2Fstorage%2Fgoog4_request&X-Goog-Date=20240719T130242Z&X-Goog-Expires=259200&X-Goog-SignedHeaders=host&X-Goog-
run any python file knn.py, knn2.py,..
with the command python knn.py --path/to/dataset/animals
